sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_talents"> <x_176383_star_wars_talents action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <campaigns/> <description>The character decreases the critical rating of any non-starship weapon he wields by 1 (to a minimum of 1) against targets that have not yet acted this encounter.</description> <field_to_update/> <force_talent>false</force_talent> <how_much_to_add/> <name>Sorry About the Mess</name> <number>TAL0001326</number> <passive_or_active>passive</passive_or_active> <sys_created_by>ben.fisher</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-07-11 16:16:04</sys_created_on> <sys_id>0bea83f62f249950e0f497eef699b64a</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>ben.fisher</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-07-11 16:16:04</sys_updated_on> <table_to_update/> </x_176383_star_wars_talents> </record_update>
